content:
Goal
* Please format "A", "B", "M", "i", "A0", "B0", "A1", "B1", "A2" and "B2" as [[variables]] instead of in <<bold>>.

* Please exclude "2Â·" and "+ 1" from [[variable]] formatting.

* Please change "(bit 0)" to "(LSB, i.e. bit 0)".

Input
* Please format "A" and "B" as [[variables]] instead of in <<bold>>.

Output
* Please format "M" as a [[variable]] instead of in <<bold>>.

Constraints
* Please format only "A" and "B" as [[variables]], and exclude the rest of the inequalities from [[variable]] formatting.

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement before STATEMENT, e.g. "write answer".

Cases
* Please add a new pair of cases where [[A]] is a 2-digit integer and [[B]] is a 4-digit integer.

* Please add a new pair of cases where [[A]] is a 4-digit integer and [[B]] is a 2-digit integer.

* Please add a new pair of cases where both [[A]] and [[B]] are 3-digit integers and [[A]] < [[B]].

Thanks.
If I'm not mistaken, the guidelines say that input variables, like A and B in both Goal and Input, should be formatted as {{variable}}.
Square brackets instead of curly ones. ðŸ˜‰

Thanks a lot for the feedback.
It was very helpful and clear.
Iâ€™ve updated the statement, formatting, stub, and test cases accordingly.
Thank you for updating the contribution too! I don't have any further comments for now.
